Items.Title: Need a taxi?
Items.Text: Just tap “Need a Taxi” and your ride is on the way! Your credit card will be charged automatically at the end of the ride.

Items.Title: In a taxi?
Items.Text: Just tap “In a Taxi” and enter the 7-digit code shown on the taxi TV screen. You credit card will be charged automatically at the end of the ride.

Items.Title: Always a fair price
Items.Text: Avoid sticker shock when you see your receipt. You'll always pay the standard taxi rate (plus tip). No monkey business.
